一開始已經係咁講，班迷干狗妄想逼害症以為我地逼干地衛冕冠軍姐

周日英超大戰曼城主場鬥車路士，主隊憑著貝拿度施華下半場一箭定江山，以1︰0小勝而回。而全場捱打的車仔整場雖沒有一次中目標射門，但領隊干地堅持他們的表現不差，亦不會愚蠢地與曼城鬥攻。

干地警告車仔︰我有野心但冇錢買人

曼城今仗佔盡優勢，27分鐘利萊辛尼窄位勁射，僅被車仔守衛艾斯派古達護空門救出，半場打和0︰0。


不過換邊後曼城迅即憑「施華組合」入波，大衛施華傳中予貝拿度施華入楔撞入，領先1︰0。之後車仔試圖反撲但攻勢未見威脅，最終在全場沒有一次中目標射門下以0︰1落敗，近5場聯賽輸了4場，已落後第4位的熱刺5分。

賽後車仔的表現備受批評，名將列納指他們的演出是「違背足球」，但干地賽後說︰「我慣於接受批評，但我不想與曼城鬥攻而輸3︰0、4︰0，幾日前阿仙奴不敵他們，雲格亦被責球隊在30分鐘失了3球。」

「那些專家必須要有足球知識，批評前要先用腦想想，不要說愚蠢的說話。球員依照我的指示，這是我們的部署，不想給他們太多空間進攻，與曼城交鋒需要動動腦筋，否則會以3、4球落敗。」

車仔近5仗已先後不敵般尼茅夫、屈福特及曼聯，但干地說︰「我想我們對那些敗仗感到失望，但今場不是，因我們與一支強隊交鋒，落後25分是個很大差距，曼城證明了我們之間的分野，但球員已盡了很大努力。」(Goal.com)

replies.msg:
N’Golo Kante suffered a frightening health scare ahead of Chelsea’s Premier League defeat to Manchester City as he fainted at the club’s training ground.

Telegraph Sport understands shocked team-mates were terrified Kante had suffered a heart problem when he momentarily passed out in front of them after training last Friday – just two days before Chelsea were due to face City.

Even though Kante was not found to have any heart issue and travelled with the rest of the squad to the Etihad, the scare was brought into sharp focus, as head coach Antonio Conte, his staff and the Chelsea players then learned of the tragic death of Davide Astori on the morning of the City game.

A Chelsea doctor arrived on the scene within seconds after Kante slumped to one side in the dressing room at the club’s Cobham training ground after Friday’s session.

Having regained consciousness and been attended to on site, Kante was sent to a specialist for a series of cardiology tests, which, fortunately, all came back clear.

Having found no heart problems or other issues, the specialist report cleared Kante to play for Chelsea against City but the 26-year-old felt unwell on Sunday morning and it was decided to take no risks. No specific reason was given by the specialist as to why Kante would have fainted, but it has been suggested that last week’s freezing temperatures may have been a contributing factor.

Chelsea players are worried that head coach Antonio Conte could push  Eden Hazard towards the Stamford Bridge exit door with his safety-first tactics. 

The Blues are prepared to pay Hazard over £300,000-a-week to extend  his contract past 2020 and ignore interest from Real Madrid and  Manchester City. 

But team-mates of Hazard fear he is becoming exasperated with being  asked to play in the false nine position in Chelsea’s biggest games and believe he wants to play for a club that will go toe-to-toe against Europe’s best. 

Although Conte is expected to leave Chelsea at the end of the season, there is genuine concern that the Italian’s approach will force Hazard  to consider whether or not the Blues can match his ambitions.  Chelsea had promised Hazard that he would be given the platform to one  day win the Ballon d’Or at the club, but his performances in the  biggest games are being stifled

Chelsea players are worried that head coach Antonio Conte could push  Eden Hazard towards the Stamford Bridge exit door with his safety-first tactics. 

The Blues are prepared to pay Hazard over £300,000-a-week to extend  his contract past 2020 and ignore interest from Real Madrid and  Manchester City. 

But team-mates of Hazard fear he is becoming exasperated with being  asked to play in the false nine position in Chelsea’s biggest games and believe he wants to play for a club that will go toe-to-toe against Europe’s best. 

Although Conte is expected to leave Chelsea at the end of the season, there is genuine concern that the Italian’s approach will force Hazard  to consider whether or not the Blues can match his ambitions.  Chelsea had promised Hazard that he would be given the platform to one  day win the Ballon d’Or at the club, but his performances in the  biggest games are being stifled

這名巴西中場2016年以2,500萬鎊由車路士轉戰中超，加盟江蘇蘇寧。他在車路士上陣近250場，協助球隊贏得英超、足總盃、聯賽盃、歐聯及歐霸盃。

拉美利斯表示：「我希望職業生涯完結前可以再效力多次車路士，我知車路士會歡迎我。」

雖然有傳他會到意甲加盟國米的機會更大，但拉美利斯坦言現時沒有任何球隊聯絡，現時會專注中超賽事。

「所有人都知國米是間大球會，重返歐洲球壇是我的心願，但現時我目標是協助蘇寧爭取佳績，沒甚麼比這更重要。」（Goal.com）

quote.msg:
車路士奪歐霸
http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x601arb

replies.msg: 夏薩特首個歐洲賽冠軍

根據《衛報》報導，利物浦教練高普近日談到干地和車路士，他給干地提出了中肯的建議。他認為車路士需要忘記最近的失利，保持求勝心、保持警惕以及侵略性。在魯營的歐聯淘汰賽第二回合中拿出好的表現，從而拯救這個賽季。
　　
高普在近期採訪時表示：「我希望我的球員將每場比賽看作是戰爭一般去奮力爭勝，如果你留意過去和現在的一些很棒的運動員，你可以從他們的眼睛里看到一些東西，當他們在比賽時他們不會感到滿意。這就是我想我們要達到的。侵略性和憤怒在足球世界里是很有用、很積極的態度。我希望球員能保持憤怒，不要自滿，而是要保持饑餓感，保持求勝心、保持警惕以及侵略性。」
　　

在上週末車路士與曼城的聯賽中，車路士在場上表現的野心被眾人詬病，車路士球員似乎表現得毫無生氣。高普在談論車路士與巴塞比賽時認為車路士的球員需要做到上述這幾點。車路士的處境如今比利物浦更危險，干地需要扭轉局勢，夏薩特也需要找回自己的狀態。在西班牙，車路士需要發覺更多怒氣和超乎尋常的潛力，在賽場上保持憤怒，才有機會拿到好的結果。
　　（來自 肆客足球）

　　（來自 肆客足球）

不用分那麼細

Russian oligarch Roman Abramovich sold off the last of his Ukrainian steelmaking business this week, as his business empire in Ukraine dwindles to one transport company.

Through his company Evraz, the 51-year-old oligarch has sold two steelmaking properties for $216 million over the past year: the Sukha Balka iron mine in Krivyi Rih, and the Dniprovsky Metallurgical Plant in Dnipro, sold this week.

Kharkiv businessman Aleksandr Yaroslavsky bought the two properties, with fellow oligarch Rinat Akhmetov taking a coking and iron enrichment plant.

The sales signal Abramovich’s near-total departure from Ukraine, leaving only EvrazTrans Ukraine, a transport company that moves iron from Sukha Balka to the steel plant.

Allegri spoke to Jan Aage Fjortoft after the Tottenham game, and the Juventus boss was asked why he’s been learning English.

In recent transfer rumours in the English press, Allegri has been linked with a move to Arsenal or Chelsea.

So is Allegri preparing for a career in the Premier League? The Juventus boss replied:

No, because I have a contract until 2020!

Allegri was also asked which team he’d like to face in the next round of the Champions League.

The Juve manager replied that he doesn’t care as long as it’s not Barcelona.

The only team I don’t want is Barcelona. Because every year, Barcelona, Barcelona, Barcelona. Now stop!
